description: Unique surrogate key for this part warranty record.
Identifier of the specific part or inventory item the warranty covers; typically a foreign key to the parts catalog.
Boolean flag marking the primary/active warranty for the part.
Reference to a warranty type code used to classify coverage.
Reference to the organization responsible for honoring the warranty (manufacturer, dealer, or third-party provider).
Code indicating which meter (miles, hours, etc.) governs warranty limits.
Flag specifying that warranty coverage starts from the installation date rather than purchase or ship date.
Date/time when warranty coverage ends if governed by calendar time.
Meter reading at which coverage ends, interpreted with the meter type; likely 0 when no meter limit applies; confirm with SME.
Free-text notes about the warranty, installation details, units, or related work orders.
System timestamp of the most recent update to this record.
Timestamp of the most recent user-initiated change; appears redundant with the system modification timestamp; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the user or process that created this record.
Timestamp when this record was created.
Identifier of the user or process that last modified this record.
Timestamp when this record was last modified.
